name: Replenish
description:
This is a game made for Trijam #191 in around  3 hours.

You are Bob, an alien who has crashed his ship. You have telekinetic powers, so you can float, and you have an enormous lifespan, but you may have to wait up to 25 years for help to find you. You have landed on a planet that was destroyed a long time ago, called Earth. You decide to make it your goal to replenish the planet before you are saved. 

Controls

A and D/arrow keys to move around the planet

Q or J to plant a sapling using your acorn, that sapling will grow to becoming a tree within a few seconds.

E or SPACE to destroy a tree after it has grown(the bar in the top tells your progress in breaking the tree) A tree can drop 1-3 acorns.

Notes

I might update this to give it a challenge by adding asteroids or something, and I know it has some bugs.

also why did I make the earth animate lol
